CHANGELOG

Path: CHANGELOG
Last Update: Mon Jun 26 12:02:16 CEST 2006

*0.2* (June 26th, 2006)

  • add a parameter to force a location to be stored in the history even if it would not normally be saved (Allen Adams, Damien Merenne)
  • add a peek_last_location to look at the last locations visited without erasing history information (Allen Adams)
  • use Module#included instead of Module#append_features
  • add a test framework and some tests.
  • don’t store deletes and puts request

*0.1* (April 27th, 2006)

  • first plugin release
